item.title: How to Update Your Docker Image Without Starting From Scratch
item.description:
Hi, it’s me here again! ðŸ‘‹

Ever been in this situation? You have a Docker image that you’ve been using for a while, and suddenly you need to add some new softwares. Building everything from scratch again? Nobody has time for that! ðŸ˜…

Let me share a neat trick I use to save time.
